clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis and type 2 diabetes

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of HE3286 can be decreased when it is combined with Pitolisant
The metabolism of HE3286 can be increased when combined with Metreleptin
The serum concentration of HE3286 can be decreased when it is combined with Cenobamate
The serum concentration of HE3286 can be increased when it is combined with Ritonavir
The serum concentration of Haloperidol can be increased when it is combined with HE3286
The metabolism of Tucatinib can be decreased when combined with HE3286
The serum concentration of HE3286 can be increased when it is combined with Abametapir
The serum concentration of HE3286 can be decreased when it is combined with Satralizumab
